boardGameGeekName: Heart of Crown: Path Before Heaven
name: Heart of Crown: Path Before Heaven
description: The fifth expansion for Heart of Crown. It requires either the base set or the Fairy Garden expansion to play and may be integrated with the other Heart of Crown expansions.
10 new types of Common Card (5 of each type plus randomizer)
Completely revised versions of 8 support cards from the Six City Alliance expansion
1 placeholder card for the pile of Exiled cards
